name: Late 2008 - Early 2009 for BitView
description:
Late 2008 - Early 2009 for BitView.
Not fully accurate, has some (unfixable) bugs.
Thanks to Imgur for image hosting and vistafan12 for creating the site.
Made by @herotrap038

user.name: Herotrap
user.about: Don't have too much to say.

additional_info:
Some bugs that sadly I can't fix at the moment:
-In a video, when you press more info, the video category is out of the description box.
-In some parts of the website some selection (such as gender, birthday, country, etc) won't appear.
Remember this is only a cosmetic edition to the site. When the site updates this code won't work at all.

Some fixeable bugs:
-Logo changer extensions will break BitView's Logo, maybe I'll fix it in an updated CSS.
